entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 09:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 09:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
